sentences.en: ...a deep valley ringed by green uplands.

sentences.cn: ...圣马力诺，这个很小的位于高地的共和制国家。

sentences.en: Be born at Campagna, valley and upland area more.
sentences.cn: 多生于平原.山谷及丘陵地区.

sentences.en: Blue hill county is a typical a mountainous area and upland county.
sentences.cn: 蓝山县是个典型的山区丘陵县.

sentences.en: He has arrived in the barren upland of central Spain.
sentences.cn: 他已经到了西班牙中部的贫瘠高地.

sentences.en: It's important that these upland farms continue to survive.
sentences.cn: 这些高原农场能继续存在下去非常重要。

sentences.en: Kang Longsi the hunting ground is half moist upland meadow climatic region.
sentences.cn: 康隆寺猎场属半湿润山地草原气候区.

sentences.en: Most of these areas are occupied by acid tropical upland soils.
sentences.cn: 这些地区大多数为酸性热带旱地土壤.

sentences.en: Our army won the battle to occupy the upland.
sentences.cn: 我军在争取小高地的战斗中取得胜利.

sentences.en: Our preference is for a cereal rather than rape , except perhaps on upland reseeds.
sentences.cn: 除了在高地重播, 我们情愿选谷物而不种油菜.

sentences.en: Rainfall has slight influence on soil moisture of upland during drought season.
sentences.cn: 旱季降雨对坡地水分影响较小.

sentences.en: The prevailing scenario will depend on the success of upland agricultural intensification.
sentences.cn: 这主要将取决于旱地农业集约化的成功.

sentences.en: The seminal root elongation of rice under short - duration upland condition was stimulated.
sentences.cn: 短期 旱作促进水稻种子根的伸长.

sentences.en: The villagers are laying by the corn in the upland fileld.
sentences.cn: 村民正给高地里的玉米中耕.

sentences.en: Therefore, runoff from high P upland fields could accelerate water eutrophication.
sentences.cn: 高磷黄壤旱地地表径流磷量能加速水体富营养化的产生.

sentences.en: They move with their flocks to upland pastures.
sentences.cn: 他们带着牲畜迁往高原上的牧场.

sentences.en: Thus they walked till they reached the foot of the upland.
sentences.cn: 他们就这样往前走,一直走到高原的山根下.

trans.tran_en: Upland places are situated on high land
Uplands are areas of high land
